data.text: Nirvana Cosmopolitan-one of the best hotels in Turkey! Thx for all ur hard-working guys! It’s ma 2 review for u, kind people, tasty foods and gorgeous service. Rysev Roman special thanks for him, for his work. Hope we’re come back to ur hotel❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
data.title: Every year we visit different countries, and I want to say, it’s one of ma memorizing trip w na family❤️ THX

On behalf of Nirvana family, we will be happy to welcome you again in Nirvana hotel chain. Looking forward to seeing you at Nirvana Hotels.

data.text: This hotel was a wonderful experience for me and my husband! Everyone was so helpful and nice especially the manager Boris and the reception chef Vedat Yüce! The staff were so friendly and welcoming. In the restaurant area the two waiters Gurkan and Ali were exceptionally polite and courteous towards us and the chief cook Selini was kind and courteos! I recommend this nice and beautiful hotel to everyone!
data.title: Fantastic!

data.text:
This was our third visit to Nirvana Cosmopolitan. 
We’ve visited Antalya many times and this hotel is the best. We love everything about this hotel. The rooms are great and spacious, the food is brilliant for AI . 
The Buffet - is very hygienic , all serving staff with gloves and hats. This for me is a must. I much prefer this over all the counters being open and helping yourself. Serat, had the best customer service , he helped us get a table every evening as we were two families and tried to sit together where possible. Serat always made this possible for us. 
Fellinis - we had breakfast every day in fellinis my children loved it. We also ate here on many occasions for lunch and dinner and even late night if the children wanted a snack (supper) before bed. The staff are great they can’t do enough for you. Even when guests are rude (I didn’t like to see this as I think it’s uncalled for). Hanife, and many others in this restaurant work so hard and always serve you with a smile. 

The outside pools and the indoor pool were great. We also used the indoor pool and jacuzzi too. My children loved the water park. 

The service in this hotel is impeccable and the staff here are a credit to the hotel. The cleans, waiters/waitresses, animation team really do go above and beyond. This is why we choose this hotel time and again and always recommend to family and friends too. 

The only thing I could suggest would be in early august when we came the entertainment wasn’t as good as it was in 2022. We still enjoyed it, but previously it was much better as this time we left a couple of times after 10/15 minutes. This isn’t a complaint though and definitely can’t wait to visit again this year.
data.title: Stunning hotel

data.text: It's been 4 days since I came here. And I really liked everything about this place. The food is delicious, the areas are clean and The employees are generally caring and nice-faced. But I would especially like to mention the animation team.  Because they did everything they could to make this holiday a good one.. They won't be here after tomorrow.  Because they're leaving their jobs.  The hotel's decision. And this decision is really bad. Because it's ridiculous that they let these people go when the hotel is so boring and they are working hard.. When we booked this hotel, we saw how strong the entertainment and activities were and decided accordingly.  Now all that's left is live music..I regret choosing this hotel in the winter season, but thank you to the staff
data.title: Boreddd

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for your precious time to share with us your review about your holiday. We are very happy that we could match your expectation.
We appreciate the wonderful review; it is great to know that you were impressed with the hospitality of the staff .
Regarding the issues you mentioned about animastion team, our hotel will be closed as of December 17 due to planned renovations. They will start working again when the hotel opens.
We always value our guests' feedbacks and will evaluate your comments constructively.
Despite your minor complaints, we hope that you will choose us again and change your mind in a positive way.
As the entire Nirvana family, we wish you all the best.
Kind regards,
Nirvana Hotels CRM Department.
owner_response.author: KILIT HOSPITALITY  GROUP

data.text:
Great hotel/complex. First , as we arrived we were greeted by an amazing girl called ALEXANDRA. I cannot compliment her enough, she is so kind,caring and helpful. ALEXANDRA is a diamond in the nirvana crown an absolute lovely person inside and out. MY WHATSAPP  CONSIERGE WAS HASSAN and once more can not be more thankful for all great time and help . 
The hotel itself is lovely and clean and very safe. I can honestly say we'll return .
Staff overall are so professional  ,in the main restaurant and VICTORIA  in the excel bar.
Now the other staff at the excel bar are just great and helpful and most of all friendly and chatty, I can pronounce their names but can't spell them😂
Also the bar staff down at the aqua bar. Great service and also chatty and friendly another pic provided.
The cleaning staff also deserve a mention, they do not stop, the place is in great condition and that comment also applies to the housemaids , rooms done superbly on a daily basis.FOOD IS TOP QUALITY !
One last person to mention. Hassan (I hope I've spelt that correctly) this guy is everywhere always working attending to guests. And again smiling and friendly will help you with bookings to cosmo  THEATHRE or cabana . Great star in this hotel staff 

Show in cosmo theatre Andy is amazing also other entertainment as  FANTASTIC DISCO WIT BURAK YETER !!!
Thank you so much and see you IN 2024
data.title: FANTASTIC HOTEL !!
